about_the_game:
Trinity is an atmospheric FPS/puzzle game set in a mysterious and surrealistic universe. In this game, you have the ability to give different properties to platform to navigate through complex environment. This core mechanic will guide you in your journey and you will travel through a wide variety of levels about life and death and you will solve many puzzles that will challenge your logic while offering an engaging and immersive experience.

- An innovating FPS/puzzle
- An engaging experience with a beautiful and interesting artistic direction.
- More that forty well thought puzzles that will challenge your skills.

This is not an actual level of the game but only a demo to give you an overview of the possibility offered by the game Trinity.
